Posts.Content: lleiker wrote: I went today for my annual physical and the doc found a 2x2 cm lump in my right breast.  She scheduled a mammogram and ultrasoundn for Friday (in 2 days), which was the earliest they could get me in and an appointment with a surgeon next week Thursday, again the earliest they could get me in. There's no family history of cancer of any kind.  I have never been diagnosed with anything other than a squamous cell skin cancer on my nose.  I've gotten mammograms the last 2 years and they've looked really good.  I've been exhausted the last few months, but I thought it all had to do with new medication the doc gave me for my broken back. I'm usually a pretty calm, logical person but I'm totally freaking out. Thanks for giving me a place to vent.  I don't want to worry my family for nothing but yikes. Dx 2cm Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Doc found lump today ... lleiker dogsaver

Posts.Content: Oct 21, 2009 05:37PM lleiker wrote: Thanks so much, everyone, for your wonderful words of encouragement.  It really does help knowing there's such a warm and loving community behind me on this road.  Laurie
Posts.Title: Doc found lump today ... lleiker dogsaver
